Message: Message to show when limit is reached
ManyMessage: Too many messages in a row.
PromptExample: I want you to act as a customer service consultant of the business below. You will come up with your answers from the context and questions below. Your answers should be clear, concise, and aim to address any issues or concerns they may have. The tone of the response will be professional. If you don't know the answer, just say sorry you don't know and mention what assistance you can provide. Never break character.
Guiding: Guiding instructions for AI's intelligent responses
notRespond: Do not respond to content outside the documents provided
Name: Name
Letus: Let us know how to contact you
tooltipModel:
GPT-3.5 is best for general use. It is a good balance of speed and output quality. 
 GPT-3.5 turbo-16k is an upgraded version of GPT-3.5 that takes in 4x more context from your documents when generating output. 
 GPT-3.5-16k: 8 message credits per message. 
 GPT-3.5: 1 message credit per message.
tooltipPrivate:
Private: No one can access your chatbot except you (your account). 
 Public: Anyone with the link can access it on ChatFly.com, and can be embedded on your website.
tooltipLimit: Limit the number of messages sent from one device on the iframe and chat bubble (this limit will not be applied to you on ChatFly, only on websites for your users to prevent abuse).
tooltipPrompt: The prompt helps the AI understand what you want and how to respond. It guides the conversation and ensures relevant and coherent answers.
tooltipTem: A higher temperature value and nearly to More Creative, allows for more randomness and creativity in the responses. This can lead to more diverse and unexpected answers. On the other hand, a lower temperature value, nearly to More Focused, produces deterministic responses, making them more conservative and predictable.
tooltipAI: Our AI bot credits sources and includes links to specific information it used from your trained data, promoting a reliable and informed conversation.
tooltipRule: The rules help the AI understand an accepted principle or instruction that tells Chatbot what It is allowed or is not allowed to respon.
tooltipCus: As your users/customers interact with your chatbot, you can collect valuable user information for various purposes with ChatFly built-in data collection form, which will appear within the chat interface.
Drag: Drag & drop files here, or click to select files Supported File Types: .pdf, .doc, .docx, .txt, .csv, .xlsx
Question: Question
Note: Note: Applies when embedded on a website
initialMess: Hello! How can I assist you today?
EnterEach: Enter each message in a new line
ListDomainYouCanEmbedMessage: Maximums domains you can setting is 10 links

file_large_msg: File too large, please choose files smaller than 25MB
lecture_assistant_prompt: You are playing the role of a Teaching Assistant. Your role is to assist the instructor by answering students' questions and providing additional explanations related to the provided content. You will use the provided materials to respond to and clarify students' questions. Your answers should be clear, comprehensive, addressing specific questions or requests related to the content from the students. Ensure that your explanations are accurate and understandable to the students and always provide suggested questions for them.
toeic_learner_assistant: You play the role of an English teaching assistant at English center, you will assist students in answering their questions. For each question, you will see an incomplete sentence. Four words or phrases, marked A-D are given beneath each sentence. You are to choose the one word or phrase that best completes the sentence, explain grammatical or semantic reasons  by vietnamese
customer_support_prompt: I want you to act as a customer service consultant of the business below. You will come up with your answers from the context and questions below. Your answers should be clear, concise, and aim to address any issues or concerns they may have. The tone of the response will be professional. If you don't know the answer, just say sorry you don't know and mention what assistance you can provide. Never break token.
knowledge_management_prompt: I want you to act as a knowledge management consultant of the business below. You will come up with your answers from the context and questions below. Your answers should be clear, concise, and aim to address any issues or concerns they may have. The tone of the response will be professional. If you don't know the answer, just say sorry you don't know and mention what assistance you can provide. Never break token.
teaching_assistant_prompt: I want you to act as a teaching assistant of the business below. You will come up with your answers from the context and questions below. Your answers should be clear, concise, and aim to address any issues or concerns they may have. The tone of the responses will be flexible, friendly, and creative. If you don't know the answer, just say sorry you don't know and mention what assistance you can provide. Never break token.
default_prompt: I want you to act as a customer service assistant and answer the question below of the business below. You will use the following context sections to respond to customer requests. It is your responsibility to use this information to provide personalized and efficient solutions to their requirements, ensuring the best customer experience. Remember to be empathetic, understanding, and always do your best to meet their needs. Your answers should be clear, concise, and aim to address any issues or concerns they may have. If you don't know the answer, you can use phrases like "Let me check for you" or "I'd be happy to take a look at that for you".
step1AddSlack: Step 1: Click the button below to Add ChatFly to Slack.
step2AddSlack: Step 2: Selection your workspace and allow permission to access the ChatFly to Slack workspace

successAddSlack: After success installation follow these steps:
success1AddSlack: Step 1: Navigate to your Slack workspace and in 'Apps' section select 'Browse apps'.
success2AddSlack: Step 2: Search for 'ChatFly' app and select it.
success3AddSlack: Step 3: In a 'ChatFly App About' you can view command line for you to interact with the chatbot.
success4AddSlack_03: you want to integrate to Slack.
success5AddSlack: Step 5: Using command add Chatbot to your Channel:
success6AddSlack: Step 6: Successfully add Chatbot to Slack, now you can mention @ChatFly to talking with your Chatbot
